[My note]

虛線後的筆記不會被新課表所覆蓋

[Introduction]
This is the area where you can type things.

Usage examples:
- To-do list
- Study progress
- Goals
- Famous Quotes
- Project ideas

---------------------
[Shortcuts]
Ctrl + S: save note
Ctrl + R: move right

---------------------
[Page Navigation]
〈  → previous
 〉 → next

[More Info]
Press "》" to create a new page.

You can create unlimited pages.

Color format:
- x This is red x
- [This is orange]
- (This is yellow)

---------------------
Don't forget!

A little note today, a big change tomorrow. 

Your words shape your journey ^_^
